1: I uplift and remember those who endure challenges.
2: I make a strong commitment to my highest values.
3: I dedicate my time to positive actions and meaningful connections.
4: I stay awake to seek inspiration and accomplish my goals.
5: I seek a place to honor the divine presence.
6: I discover joy and purpose in nature's beauty.
7: I joyfully worship in the sacred space.
8: I rise in strength and find my rest.
9: I celebrate with joy while embracing righteousness.
10: I embrace the support and presence of those chosen for greatness.
11: I will rise to my rightful place of honor.
12: When I teach my children well, they create lasting legacies.
13: I thrive in a place chosen for greatness.
14: I find lasting peace and joy in my chosen place.
15: I receive abundant blessings that fulfill my needs.
16: I celebrate the joy and salvation of those devoted to the good.
17: I will help my chosen one shine brightly.
18: My successes shine brightly while others face their own consequences.
